text: Short but classic theme full of nostalgia. I played so many hours of this game as a kid, but never beat it. Do I have to mention the underwater stage? I put Funuhashi as the composer, but he only composed half the soundtrack and no one knows who did the rest, including this Overworld theme. I'm not a fan of the latest TMNT movies... I'm a 1990 TMNT movie fan. Oh, and Michelangelo is definitely the best turtle.
